snippet.title: Every Day We Fight - Gameplay Trailer | Turn-Based Tactical Roguelite
snippet.description:
In Every Day We Fight, an alien invasion threatens humanity. Time has stopped for all but your small band of freedom fighters. Caught in a seemingly endless loop, you must shape these ordinary civilians into heroes as they repeatedly fight and die in this turn-based tactical roguelite.

➤ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546080/Every_Day_We_Fight/

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse

Follow us on social media:

➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/
